name: Morning Blood Pressure Medication
details: Take prescribed antihypertensive with breakfast.

name: Evening Insulin Injection
details: Administer prescribed long-acting insulin dose before bed.

name: Nightly Cholesterol Medication
details: Take statin as prescribed, typically before lights out.

name: Monthly Primary Care Physician Check-in
details: Review vital signs, medication efficacy, and overall program adherence with PCP.

name: Morning Blood Pressure Medication
details: Take critical BP medication upon waking.

name: Evening Diabetes Medication
details: Take prescribed diabetes medication with dinner.

name: Bedtime Sleep Aid
details: Take sleep aid 30 minutes before planned bedtime.

name: Morning Blood Pressure Medication
details: Take prescribed antihypertensive with breakfast.

name: Evening Insulin Injection
details: Administer long-acting insulin before bed.

name: Morning Cardioprotective Medication
details: Take prescribed dose with 8oz of water upon waking.

name: Evening Metabolic Support Medication
details: Take prescribed dose 30 minutes after dinner.

name: Iron Supplement Intake
details: Take iron supplement 3 times per week, preferably not with dairy.

name: Daily Vitamin D Supplement
details: Take supplement with largest meal of the day for absorption.

name: Bi-Weekly Prescription Refill Check
details: Check inventory of critical medications and request refills if stock is below 7 days supply.

name: Targeted Grocery Shopping
details: Purchase fresh produce and lean proteins based on the weekly menu plan.

name: Monthly Dietitian Review
details: Review progress on nutritional goals, discuss challenges, and adjust meal plan macros.

name: Asthma Inhaler Refill/Check
details: Ensure reliever inhaler is accessible and check remaining doses.

name: Hydration and Water Tracking
details: Track fluid intake to ensure minimum 8 glasses (2L) consumption.

name: Daily Hydration Goal Tracking (2.5L)
details: Ensure minimum 2.5L fluid intake is logged in the wellness app.

name: Log All Meals and Macros
details: Use tracking app to log all food and drink intake throughout the day.

name: Meal Prep: Healthy Lunches
details: Prepare 5 healthy, portion-controlled lunches for the week.

name: Cardio: Zone 2
details: Maintain heart rate in Zone 2 for 45 minutes (running, cycling, or brisk walking).

name: Log Detailed Food Intake
details: Record all meals and snacks in the program app, focusing on portion size and macros.

name: Achieve Daily Step Goal (7000 steps)
details: Ensure minimum 7,000 steps are recorded, utilizing breaks for movement.

name: Core Stability Routine (Mat Work)
details: Focus on planks, bird-dogs, and rotational movements for spinal health.

name: Daily 10,000 Steps Goal Tracking
details: Ensure 10,000 steps are recorded by end of day.

name: Prescribed Anti-inflammatory Dose
details: Take as needed/prescribed for joint pain. Do not take on empty stomach.

name: Weekly Anti-Inflammatory Dose
details: Take scheduled dose only if pain rating is above 4/10.

name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Session
details: One-on-one session with therapist to work on coping mechanisms.

name: Track Weekly Supplement Review
details: Review and log current supplement regimen; order refills as needed.

name: Self-Administer Immunosuppressant Injection
details: Perform injection following sterile procedure checklist.

name: Aerobic Cardio Session
details: Sustained moderate-intensity cardio (running, cycling, elliptical).

name: Strength Training - Lower Body Focus
details: Focus on squats, deadlifts, and accessory leg exercises.

name: Prepare Healthy Lunches (Batch Prep)
details: Prepare 3-4 days worth of high-protein, low-carb lunches.

name: Strength Training Session A
details: Full body strength workout, focusing on compound movements.

name: Weekend Batch Meal Preparation
details: Prepare 3-4 healthy meals in bulk for the upcoming week.

name: Strength Training - Upper Body Focus
details: Target chest, back, and arms using free weights or machines.

name: Cardio Interval Training (HIIT)
details: 20 minutes of high-intensity intervals followed by cool-down.

name: Low-Impact Cardio Session (45 min)
details: Use elliptical or stationary bike to maintain target heart rate zone 2.

name: Swimming Laps
details: Low-impact full body workout in the pool.

name: Weekly B12 Injection Administration
details: Receive prescribed B12 injection from the nurse or self-administer.

name: Asthma Inhaler Check
details: Ensure inhaler is accessible and check peak flow readings if applicable.

name: Post-Workout Protein Shake Prep
details: Ensure protein supplement is consumed within 30 minutes of physical activity.

name: Hydration Tracking
details: Track total water intake to meet 8-cup daily goal.

name: Log Food Diary
details: Record all meals and snacks in the tracking app 5 times per week.

name: Weekly Bone Density Medication
details: Take on an empty stomach with a full glass of water. Remain upright for 30 minutes.

name: Maintain Sleep Hygiene Routine
details: Implement 1-hour screen cutoff before bed and light stretching.

name: Active Recovery Walk
details: Light-paced walking to aid muscle recovery and boost mood.

name: Core Stability Workout
details: Focus on planks, crunches, and rotational core movements.

name: Active Recovery Walk
details: Low-intensity walk to aid recovery and boost daily step count.

name: Strength Training Session B (Home)
details: Resistance band or dumbbell workout focusing on accessory lifts.

name: Weekend Smoothie Preparation
details: Prepare nutrient-dense smoothies with fruits, vegetables, and protein powder.

name: Low Impact Swimming Session
details: Swim 20 laps or perform water aerobics for joint health.

name: Active Recovery Walk
details: Moderate pace walk outdoors to aid muscle recovery.

name: Grocery Shopping & Healthy Pantry Stocking
details: Purchase items based strictly on pre-approved list; avoid impulse buys.

name: Track Calorie/Macro Intake
details: Log all meals and snacks using a nutrition tracking app.

name: Mindful Portion Control Check
details: Take a moment before meals to consciously assess serving sizes and slow down eating pace.

name: Weekly B12 Injection
details: Clinical administration of B12 shot.

name: Evening Relaxation Yoga/Stretching
details: Gentle stretching and restorative poses for flexibility.

name: High-Fiber Breakfast Prep
details: Prepare a breakfast high in fiber (e.g., overnight oats or complex grains).

name: Flexibility/Stretching Routine
details: Perform a comprehensive 30-minute full-body stretching routine.

name: Mindfulness Meditation
details: Guided meditation practice using an app or recording.

name: Fiber Intake Review
details: Review food logs to ensure 25g minimum daily fiber intake is met.

name: Weekend Hike or Cycle
details: Extended aerobic activity to boost cardiovascular health.

name: Guided Meditation Practice
details: Use a guided app for mindfulness and relaxation before sleep.

name: Try New Fiber-Rich Recipe
details: Experiment with one new recipe focusing on whole grains or legumes.

name: Flexibility and Foam Rolling Session
details: Focus on major muscle groups, holding stretches for 30 seconds.

name: Review Nutrition Data with App
details: Analyze weekly trends for sodium, fiber, and sugar intake.

name: Long Outdoor Hike/Walk (75 min)
details: Explore a local trail, maintaining a moderate pace.

name: Guided Mindfulness Meditation
details: Use a guided app session focusing on stress reduction.

name: Meal Planning & Grocery List Prep
details: Plan 7 days of meals focusing on balanced nutrition and adherence to dietary restrictions.

name: Physician Check-in (Monthly)
details: Review blood work, medication efficacy, and overall program progress.

name: Monthly Stress Management Workshop
details: Group workshop covering coping strategies and time management.

name: Primary Care Physician Check-in
details: Review overall health metrics, medication efficacy, and address non-urgent concerns.

name: Monthly Deep Tissue Massage Therapy
details: Focus on releasing tension in upper back and neck.

name: Take Daily Multivitamin
details: Take general health multivitamin with a meal.

name: Vitamin D Intake
details: Take Vitamin D supplement twice a week with a meal containing healthy fats.

name: Practice Reading Nutrition Labels
details: Focus on identifying added sugars and sodium content in packaged foods.

name: Registered Dietitian Follow-up
details: Review dietary goals, troubleshoot barriers, and adjust meal plan.

name: Dietitian Follow-up Consultation
details: Review macro adherence, discuss challenges, and adjust meal plan goals.

name: Posture and Mobility Drills
details: Exercises targeting tight areas (hips, shoulders) for improved posture.

name: Weekend Hiking/Outdoor Activity
details: Engage in an enjoyable outdoor activity (hiking, biking, kayaking).

name: Try New Vegetable/Recipe
details: Incorporate a new, nutrient-dense vegetable or healthy recipe into dinner preparation.

name: Guided Meditation Session
details: Use an app or recording for focused mindfulness and stress reduction.

name: Stress Management Cognitive Drill
details: Practice cognitive restructuring techniques taught by the therapist to manage anxiety triggers.

name: Try New Healthy Recipe
details: Experiment with one new nutritious recipe per week.

name: Snack Portioning
details: Pre-portion 3 days worth of snacks to manage intake.

name: Grocery Shopping & Planning
details: Shop for groceries following a pre-planned healthy list.

name: Swimming/Water Aerobics
details: Low-impact aquatic exercise session.

name: Sleep Hygiene Review
details: Dedicated time to ensure bedroom environment and evening routines support quality sleep.

name: Balance and Proprioception Drills
details: Single-leg stands and tandem walking to prevent falls.

name: Review Calorie Goals
details: Review average weekly calorie intake and adjust goals for the coming week.

name: Core Stabilization Routine
details: Focused exercises on core strength and posture.

name: Track Weekly Steps Goal
details: Check wearable device to ensure weekly steps target was met (e.g., 70,000 steps).

name: Stress Management Workshop
details: Attend a group workshop focusing on advanced stress reduction techniques.

name: Nutritionist Review
details: Consultation to refine dietary plan based on progress and challenges.

name: Afternoon Blood Glucose Check
details: Check blood glucose levels in afternoon.

name: Evening Vitamin Supplement
details: Take daily multivitamin with dinner.

name: Morning Thyroid Medication
details: Take levothyroxine before breakfast.

name: Bedtime Medication Routine
details: Evening medication regimen before sleep.
